channel.title: tailscale on davegallant.ca
channel.description: Recent content in tailscale on davegallant.ca

item.title: Setting up Gitea Actions with Tailscale
item.description: In this post I’ll go through the process of setting up Gitea Actions and Tailscale, unlocking a simple and secure way to automate workflows.

item.title: Watching YouTube in private
item.description: I recently stumbled upon yewtu.be and found it intriguing. It not only allows you to watch YouTube without being on YouTube, but it also allows you to create an account and subscribe to channels without a Google account. What sort of wizardry is going on under the hood? It turns out that it’s a hosted instance of invidious.

item.title: What to do with a homelab
item.description: A homelab can be an inexpensive way to host a multitude of internal/external services and learn a lot in the process.
